New Sheriff’s Deputies Graduate from the Academy

Earlier this morning two new sheriff’s deputies were recognized at a ceremony held in Plainfield, Indiana after successfully completing the Indiana Law Enforcement Academy (ILEA) Basic Training Course. Deputy Nicholas Helfert and Deputy Cody Brandenstein were...
